CmdInsertShape Class Reference

CmdInsertShape class is the insert command for shapes stored in the command stack. More...

Detailed Description

CmdInsertShape class is the insert command for shapes stored in the command stack.

CmdInsertShape represents a single shape insertion action on a scene, insert a new shape node to the scene.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CmdInsertShape::CmdInsertShape ( TShapeKit *  shapeKit,
TShape *  shape,
SceneModel *  model,
QUndoCommand *  parent = 0 
)

Creates a new shape insert command that adds a shape to shapekit node in the model.

If parent is not null, this command is appended to parent's child list and then owns this command.

CmdInsertShape::~CmdInsertShape (  ) 

Destroys the CmdInsertShape object.

Member Function Documentation

void CmdInsertShape::redo (  )  [virtual]

Applies a change to the model. After redo() the model will contain new shape node located as shapekit type node child.

See also:
undo().

void CmdInsertShape::undo (  )  [virtual]

Reverts model state. After undo() is called, the shapekit node will not contain a shape type node.

See also:
redo().
